subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Women)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Nadirah McKenith scored on a coast-to-coast layup with 0.1 of a second left, lifting third-seeded St. John’s to a 69-67 victory over Creighton on Sunday in the first round of the N.C.A.A. women’s tournament.
snippet: Nadirah McKenith scored on a coast-to-coast layup with 0.1 of a second left, lifting third-seeded St. John’s to a 69-67 victory over Creighton on Sunday in the first round of the N.C.A.A. women’s tournament.
